resources.string: Shake Or Tap To Blitz Your Boredom!
The Boredom Blitzer! Over 500 Activities sure to bust your boredom to bits! About App

Welcome to the Boredom Blitzer! My name is Katherine Westphal and I created this little app to help kids play more, indoors and outdoors. The activities in this app are designed to be fun, first and foremost. Many activities involve moving around, reducing childhood obesity and improving fitness. Many activities involve playing with others, building social skills. Many involve creativity, boosting brain activity.

 Follow us on Facebook and Twitter! 

 This app was produced by zonabidesign.
